pullrequest.title: ignition-abichecker.bash: set USE_GCC8 according to package and version

content.raw:
disabling the dart ppa in e4e7a10 breaks osrf/gazebo, because we are only hosting bionic debs of dart6 on packages.osrfoundation.org

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=gazebo-ci-default-xenial-amd64-gpu-none&build=390)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-default-xenial-amd64-gpu-none/390/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-default-xenial-amd64-gpu-none/390/

so maybe only use the ppa on xenial?
content.html:
disabling the dart ppa in e4e7a10 breaks osrf/gazebo, because we are only hosting bionic debs of dart6 on packages.osrfoundation.org

  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-default-xenial-amd64-gpu-none/390/

so maybe only use the ppa on xenial?
